title: Lecture 1: Introduction
content:
# Lecture 1: Introduction

What happens when you open a program?
What happens when you save to a file?
What happens when you malloc?
What happens when you type on the keyboard?
What happens when you print a file?
What happens when you use `printf`?

## What is an operating system?

Well, it 
* manages resources
* creates execution environments
* loads programs
* provides common services and utilities
